items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compliments all night!
items.body: I recently wore this dress to an event, and it was absolutely stunning! The fit was just perfectâ€”hugging in all the right places and making me feel confident and elegant. The material is high-quality, comfortable, and has a beautiful finish. I received so many compliments throughout the night. Overall, itâ€™s a gorgeous formal dress thatâ€™s both sexy and classy. Highly recommend it! Read more
items.author: Laura Michalski

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such an elegant dress for the price!
items.body: Gosh, do I love this dress! It is so comfortable. It didnâ€™t cling. The length was great and I am only 5â€™2â€. The quality is good. The material is breathable and itâ€™s also not thin, but itâ€™s not too thick. I received a ton of compliments. I danced up a storm comfortably. I wish I could get this dress in all of the colors. Read more
items.author: Dawn Lever

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Accurate sizing
items.body: Fits very well and is so pretty! Can't believe the price! Love this dress! Read more
items.author: Charles Maddox

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars I feel so beautiful in this dress! (but runs a bit small)
items.body: Absolutely stunning dress. A real show stopper. I'm 5 ft nothing, 170 lbs. I ordered the large ased on Amazon's recomm. endation. I need the XL so am returning it and ordering the larger size. But the material is quality; not thin or cheap looking. Very classy dress with some sex appeal. The V neck is not super low but not dowdy either. The slit is not so hight that it's tacky looking. Easily covers the legs of my shapewear. Highly recommend this dress; just pay attention to sizing info as I believe it to run a bit small. It fits very snugly. The length is perfect for my 5 ft frame with heels on. Would be ankle length for a taller person but floor length for me. Read more
items.author: BDAnative

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy and Fit to size
items.body: Fit to size, very stylish and perfect for formal occasions. I also like the material. It is not too heavy or light. I strongly recommend this dress. Read more
items.author: Donna Marie Gordon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Color is so rich to me.
items.body: Donâ€™t mind my toddler in the back lol! But I love this dress so much, recommended for weddings, dates and any formal event. I had the most compliments with this dress. Affordable, comfortable and cute! Read more
items.author: Syerra Sonn

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Large breast friendly.
items.body: Very nice dress for a formal occasion. I didn't love the fabric though, was def a thick crepe (think cheap wool dress pants). It was also slightly to short gor my height 5'8. I could have used 1 more inch. As a G cup, it fit the girls nicely- not too tight and nice coverage Read more
items.author: Dani

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable-Formfitting-Elegant
items.body: Mom of two here. 185 lbs, 5â€™ 7â€. Material is indeed super stretchy, thick enough that you canâ€™t see garment/obvious panty lines, not overly heavy to wear, and comfortable in a way that isnâ€™t itchy at all. It does hug your curves as a lot of other reviewers have said, and a little shape wear never hurt anyone. I ordered a size Large and it is not tight enough to be uncomfortable, but just tight enough that the spandex wants to bunch in the tummy areas. I may order an XL in the same size just to be a tish more comfortable. Other than that, my only gripe is I wish the off the shoulder parts of the dress would stay down as they have a tendency to ride up higher on the point of my shoulder and higher with very little movement. This could also be a sizing thing, not enough fabric for this part, or just being wide shouldered gal, but either way the draping back pieces are just so cute and really break up the roundness and give some shape to the whole ensemble. Read more
items.author: Jayden Marie Halsey

short_description:
Womens Dress Formal Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress Formal Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White Wedding Guest Dresses, Black Evening Dresses, Burgundy Elegant Dresses, Purple Wedding Guest Dress, Red Formal Dress, Blue Formal Dress, Green Formal Dress for Women. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
